channel.title: Programming on Anh Hoang Duc
channel.description: Recent content in Programming on Anh Hoang Duc

item.title: Automating Data Exploratory Analysis with purrr and NSE
item.description: In the life of an analyst, one have to spend much time on data exploratory analysis. When you have to repeat the task multiple times, you might need to write a function. For example, I often need to do an analysis between a numeric variable and a factor variable in the following process: Compare statistics among groups (mean, median,…) Make an ANOVA model to compare mean among groups Draw some chart to vizualize difference among groups To solve this problem, I create a function called compare_group as follows:
